title: Purpose over polish
summary: What to cut so clarity can speak.
html: Polish without purpose is noise. Cut the ornaments that hide outcomes. Ship clarity first; refine where it meaningfully improves understanding or courage.

title: Design with encouragement
summary: Microcopy and flows that build courage without fluff.
html: We remember the apps that believed in us. Small, timely messages and generous defaults reduce fear and create momentum. Design is not only polish; it is courage-transfer.
